about_the_game:
Step into the dynamic world of customs enforcement across three bustling locales: the Airport, the Port, and the Post Sorting Facility. As a fresh recruit under the guidance of Reggie, your seasoned mentor, you're thrust into the heart of the action.

Harness the power of shared international intelligence as you sift through the throngs of incoming travelers at the Airport. Your keen eye must spot those flagged in the daily intel report, individuals exiting through unauthorized doors, or displaying suspicious behavior. Every interaction is a puzzle to solve, with no margin for error.

At the Port, the pace is relentless as trucks roll in one after another. Armed with state-of-the-art X-ray technology, you'll scrutinize every detail of the cargo manifests against the contents revealed by the scans. Prepare to uncover surprises hidden within seemingly innocuous shipments.

Meanwhile, a surge in incoming packages keeps the Post Sorting Facility bustling. With sniffer dogs by your side, you'll delve into parcels flagged as suspicious, those originating from outside the EU, or with questionable declared values.

Fear not the challenges ahead, for Reggie and a network of European intelligence are there to support you every step of the way. Embrace the excitement of the hunt and the satisfaction of safeguarding your nation's borders.

highlighted.name: Giving Credit Where Credit Is Due

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Core2Duo or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Nothing To Declare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 1.66GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: As a guardian of the customs realm, you hold sway over the comings and goings of travelers, packages, and cargo containers alike. Do you possess the mettle to tackle such a formidable responsibility?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch
